annotations.description: We have seen a few chances and nice movements, but the overall impression of the game is rather average and not hugely entertaining. The home side is dominant and dictating the tempo of the game, mainly because of their work rate and accurate passing. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession, while the visitors look to counter-attack.
